result.name: CPU_PROCESS
result.description: The total percentage of CPU being consumed by the process referenced in the source

result.name: CPU_ONE_MIN
result.description: The 1 minute rolling average of the time to collect the CPU metrics

result.name: MEM_PROCESS
result.description: The total percentage of memory being consumed by the process referenced in the source

result.name: RMEM_PROCESS
result.description: The total number of resident in-memory bytes being consumed by the process referenced in the source

result.description: The total number of virtual memory bytes being consumed by the process referenced in the source

result.name: INTERVAL_CPU
result.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture CPU metrics

result.description: The interval that the meter is using to capture metrics about file usage

result.name: TIME_PROCESS
